snippet: Nevada’s state attorney general found nothing illegal or criminal in Manny Pacquiao’s controversial split-decision loss to Timothy Bradley last month in Las Vegas, according to a letter made public Tuesday.
lead_paragraph: Nevada’s state attorney general found nothing illegal or criminal in Manny Pacquiao’s controversial split-decision loss to Timothy Bradley last month in Las Vegas, according to a letter made public Tuesday.

headline.seo: No Criminality Found in Pacquiao Loss to Bradley
headline.main: No Criminality Found in Pacquiao Loss to Bradley
